title: RA Sushi offers Nigiri Assortment with seven types of fish
statement: The Nigiri Assortment includes two pieces each of tuna, yellowtail and salmon, plus one piece each of whitefish, shrimp, octopus and sweet egg.

citations.quote: Two pieces of each: tuna, yellowtail and salmon; served with one piece each: whitefish, shrimp, octopus and sweet egg
